Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Avatar Boulevard, between the Hospital and the Magic Shop.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road is the Oceancrest Caretaking Facility for the Mortally Wounded, a hospital for people who have suffered great injuries. On the west side of the road is Danielle's Mystic Mage's Emporium, where all sorts of potions and spells may be purchased.
